about_the_game:
The soundtrack to RimWorld by Alistair Lindsay. Includes 31 tracks of space western music.

Each track is available in high-quality MP3 format as well as lossless FLACC format.

All proceeds go directly to the composer.
detailed_description:
The soundtrack to RimWorld by Alistair Lindsay. Includes 31 tracks of space western music.

Each track is available in high-quality MP3 format as well as lossless FLACC format.

All proceeds go directly to the composer.
